title: Zayed University students take part in the Government Summit
summary: A significant number of Zayed University students actively participated in the Government Summit that was livestreamed on both campuses in Abu Dhabi and Dubai. Her Excellency Dr. Maitha Al Shamsi, Minister of State and president of Zayed University thanked the ongoing support of His Highness Sheikh Mansoor bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Presidential Affairs, and shed light on the absolute commitment of Zayed University to provide students with a healthy environment that enables them to take initiatives, grab opportunities, and become active contributors in the development of the nation.

title: Khalifa Fund supports Zayed University students
summary: Khalifa Fund offered Zayed University students with 95 iPads and 97 laptops, in an attempt to strengthen the strategic partnerships between the two institutions and further support Zayed University student-initiated projects.

title: Zayed University students take part in a multiculturalism program in Scotland
summary: His Excellency, Mr Mirza Al-Sayegh, Chairman of the Board of Directors of the Al-Maktoum College, announced the launch of a program of multiculturalism in Scotland starting February 8 and until March 7 during a press conference held at the headquarters of Dubai Courts in the presence of Dr. Ahmed bin Hazim, Director General of Dubai Courts, and Prof. Abdalla AlAmiri, Provost of Zayed University, and a number of official representatives from participating universities, and participating students and families.

title: His Highness Sheikh Mansoor bin Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum takes part in Zayed University's National Day Celebrations

title: Zayed University hosts an art exhibition showcasing the history of the Late Sheikh Saeed bin Maktoum
summary: His Highness Sheikh Mansoor bin Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum took part in Zayed University’s 42nd National Day celebrations, in the presence of a number of zayed University officials, students, faculty and staff, and was accompanied by Zayed University’s Provost Prof. Abdalla AlAmiri on a tour around Dubai Campus, where students had exhibited their National Day projects and initiatives.

title: Zayed University successfully conducts a Professional Development week in Abu Dhabi and Dubai
summary: Zayed University successfully organized a Professional Development week on both its campuses in Abu Dhabi and Dubai during the week of December 15, 2013.

title: Zayed University students livestream Absher's panel discussion using "Ankabut" technology
summary: Zayed University students in Abu Dhabi and Dubai were able to livestream yesterday’s panel discussion which took place in UAEU in the presence of His Highness Sheikh Mansour bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Presidential Affairs, part of “Absher” initiative.

title: Zayed University celebrates the Flag Day
summary: Zayed University celebrated the national joy of the Flag Day on both its campuses in Abu Dhabi and Dubai, in line with the directives of Vice President, Prime Minister and Ruler of Dubai His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, who called on UAE nationals and residents to raise the flag as of December 2nd and until the UAE’s Union Day.

title: ADDF awards exemplary Zayed University students
summary: The Abu Dhabi Fund for Development (ADDF) granted AED 120,000 to support exemplary Zayed University students throughout the academic years 2013-2014 and 2014- 2015, in an attempt to reward academic excellence and recognize exceptional achievements in the UAE community.

title: Zayed University Council meets approves new disciplines
summary: Zayed University Council held a meeting under the chairmanship of Her Excellency Dr. Maitha AlShamsi, Minister of State and President of Zayed University, and in the presence of the council members, His Excellency Ahmad Humaid Al Tayer, Head of the Supervising Committee over the endowment fund at Zayed University, Her Excellency Dr. Amal Al Qubaisi, First Deputy of Speaker of the Federal National Council, His Excellency Sami Dhaen Qamzi, Director General of Dubai Economic Department, His Excellency Ali Rashid Al Ketbi Chairman of Abu Dhabi Tawteen Council, and His Exellency  Saeed Mubarak Rashid Hajri, Executive Director of Abu Dhabi Investment Authority, and Prof. Abdalla AlAmiri, Provost of Zayed University.

title: Zayed University celebrates the World Energy Day by launching ZEIN
summary: Zayed University has celebrated World Energy Day with an array of activities on both its campuses in Abu Dhabi and Dubai. Exactly one year after the first World Energy Day was staged in Dubai (an event at which 89 United Nations member states adopted The Dubai Declaration - Energy for All), Zayed University commemorated the first anniversary by launching a number of initiatives.

title: Zayed University's College of Education Granted Prominent International Accreditation
summary: The Council for the Accreditation of Educator Preparation (CAEP), Washington, has just granted a new accreditation to Zayed University's College of Education.

title: Zayed University organizes orientation week for new students
summary: Zayed University launched the “Ya Hala” orientation week today, September 2nd, on both Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses. The two-day orientation program is expected to welcome over 3,000 female and male students, as well as their parents and/or guardians.

title: H.E. Dr. Maitha AlShamsi, President of Zayed University Highlights the University's Strategy for the New Academic Year
summary: In her keynote address on the occasion of the University’s 16th convocation, and in the presence of H.E. Prof. Abdalla AlAmiri, ZU Provost along with faculty and staff,  H.E. Dr. Maitha AlShamsi, Minister of State and President of Zayed University praised the tremendous progress the university has made since its founding in 1998. During her address, H.E. Dr. Al Shamsi pointed the tremendous achievements the university has made in terms of academic recognition, services provided, and contributions to disseminate knowledge and education, in its short life span.

title: Zayed university graduate awarded a Fulbright Scholarship
summary: AMIDEAST Abu Dhabi and the US- Emirati Education Committee have just concluded their annual interviews for the Fulbright Scholarship cycle 2014- 2015 and have announced, that Sarah Al Awadhi, a Zayed University Alumnae, Class of 2011, is one of two recipients who have earned this elite Scholarship.

title: ZU Students participate in the "Multiculturalism & Leadership" Programs in Dundee.
summary: In its continuous effort to promote multi-culturalism, the Al-Maktoum College of Higher Education at Dundee-Scotland is on the go to welcome a new batch of female students from all universities of the United Arab Emirates who will participate in the 16th session of the “Multiculturalism & Leadership” program, organized by the College, August 12-. September 10, 2013.

title: Zayed University Granted Renewal of International Accreditation
summary: The Middle States Commission on Higher Education (MSCHE) in the United States has announced that Zayed University’s full international accreditation has been reaffirmed. This reaffirmation of accreditation by the MSCHE marks Zayed University one of  a very few universities in the Middle East to achieve this status.

title: Zayed University to train 100  Federal Government employees as of September 2013

The conference aimed to inspire, educate and encourage female ZU students to become future global leaders in the United Arab Emirates and the broader Gulf Cooperation Council countries. It also provided students with an opportunity to connect with distinguished UAE business and to learn from their experiences.

His Highness presented to Zayed University’s VP a memorable shield to mark Zayed University’s continuous support and tremendous multi-cultural  and educational contributions.

title: Zayed University organizes a conference about "The State of the Social, Humanitarian, and Islamic sciences in Arab and Western Academia"
summary: Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, Vice President of Zayed University gave the Opening speech on behalf of His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Mubarak Al Nahayan, Minister of Culture, Youth, and Community Development, during the conference “The State of the Social, Humanitarian, and Islamic sciences in Arab and Western Academia” organized by Institute of Islamic World Studies at Zayed University in Dubai, which is hosting more than 20 well-known international speakers.

title: His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan inaugurates "Hear my Voice - Understanding Hearing Loss" conference at Zayed University
summary: His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan, Minister of Culture, Youth, and Community Development, inaugurated the "Hear my Voice Understanding Hearing Loss" conference that is held under His Excellency’s patronage and organized by Zayed University and "Kalimati Speech & Communication Center" at the Zayed University Dubai campus. The two-day conference attracts many international speakers and health care professionals, representative from several hospitals and clinics dealing with hearing impairment, UAE & GCC Deaf Associations and the UAE Deaf community.

title: Grand Imam of Al-Azhar visits Zayed University
summary: The Grand Imam of Al-Azhar Dr. Ahmed Al Tayyeb said Zayed University has the adequate resources to make a scientific, academic and cultural breakthrough in the UAE.

title: Zayed University launches the UAE National Film Library and Archive, and ZUMEFF
summary: Zayed University will officially launch the UAE National Film Library and Archive (UNFLA) today, under the patronage and in the presence of His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan, Minister of Culture, Youth and Community Development. The first of its kind in the Gulf, the archive will be a permanent home for the work of Emirati funded and made films for generations to come.

title: Zayed University students raise Dh 109,606 for displaced Syrians
summary: Zayed University students have collected about Dh109,606  for the displaced Syrians during the charity campaign “Action 2013” that took place on Zayed University Abu Dhabi Campus last week.

title: Four- Time World Boxing Champion Laila Ali visits Zayed University Campus in Abu Dhabi
summary: Laila Ali, Daughter of Legendary Boxer Mohammed Ali and Four-Time World Boxing Champion, gave an enlightening talk in front of Zayed University students, faculty and staff, about the importance of leading active and healthy lifestyles, during her visit to Zayed University Campus in Abu Dhabi earlier today.

title: Zayed University becomes the first institution outside the UK to be accredited for the UK matrix standard award in career guidance
summary: Zayed University’s Career Services have been awarded the matrix Standard for information, advice and guidance. This followed an external assessment process undertaken by emqc Ltd, the organization responsible for the management, administration and delivery of the matrix Standard. This award highlights Zayed University’s continued commitment to deliver career programs and services that meet internationally recognized quality standards.

title: Zayed University Dubai organizes Careers Spotlight 2013

His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan toured around the exhibition that was held on Abu Dhabi campus, accompanied by HE Ahmad Humaid Al Tayer, HE Khaldoon Al Mubarak, Dr. Maryam Al Rumaithi, Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, and Dr. Larry Wilson. The exhibition showcased very rare and valuable cars that were produced in the 1920s.

The conference was held in association with Student Affairs Administrators in Higher Education (NASPA), a leading association for the advancement, health, and sustainability of the student affairs profession, and American College Personnel Association (ACPA), and attracted 150 student administrators from the GCC and international universities.

title: His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan oversees the strategies and programs of the Dubai Autism Center

title: Zayed University's  Student Council in Abu Dhabi honors the UAE National Football team

A celebration was held on Zayed University’s Abu Dhabi campus to acknowledge this great achievement in the presence of players Ismail Matar and Hamdan Al Kamali.

summary: Under the patronage of H.E Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University, the 11th annual Zayed University Middle East Film Festival (ZUMEFF) has been scheduled to take place online between Nov 16th to 18th, 2021.

summary: Zayed University (ZU) participates in the Global Education and Training Exhibition 2022 (GETEX), which is held under the patronage of His Excellency Sheikh Nahyan bin Mubarak Al Nahyan, Minister of Tolerance and Coexistence in the UAE, at the Sheikh Rashid Hall - Dubai International Convention and Exhibition Center from February 24 to 26.

title: Zayed University Receives Malaysian Minister Of Women, Family And Community Development

title: Zayed University launches new research centre to transform Arabic teaching and learning
summary: Zayed University today announced the launch of the Zai Centre, a pioneering new research centre focused on Arabic teaching and learning. Zai will be the first academic institution in the UAE to look at how Arabic is taught around the world. Led by internationally acclaimed academic Dr Hanada Taha Thomure, Zai will identify best practice for teaching Arabic and develop the tools to empower teachers enabling them to inspire their students. Zai will also provide parents with guidance on how they can ensure that their children are able to improve their Arabic at home from a young age.
